item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Find the other commands in your source and create your own nice little conditional statement like all the rest of them.

If you need me to be more specific: What base?

item.title: Please Help! ::commands
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

ctrl + f commands.java
It can vary what you want, I took this out of a server.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("commands")) { c.sendMessage("All commands have a :: at the start"); c.sendMessage("gwd); c.sendMessage("strykeworms"); c.sendMessage("yell"); c.sendMessage("dzone"); c.sendMessage("players"); c.sendMessage("changepassword 'new password here'"); c.sendMessage("funpk(beta stage report any bugs!)"; c.sendMessage("frosts"); c.sendMessage("cookies"); c.sendMessage("report 'playername'"); c.sendMessage("reset 'skillname' i.e. ::resetstr"); c.sendMessage("queen"); c.sendMessage("agility"); c.sendMessage("nomad"); c.sendMessage("hunter"); c.sendMessage("rules"); c.sendMessage("+ MUCH more"); }
You should be able to edit some of the cmds to what you want. Use them as a structure.
You can make interfaces pop up instead of messages in chat box.

Read full topic
